Ganciclovir is an acyclic 2â€²-deoxyguanosine analogue for the management of CMV.
65 It is available in oral and parenteral formulations. Oral ganciclovir is poorly absorbed, with a bioavailability of only 5%.
65 Management of active CMV disease is therefore with IV ganciclovir or its oral valyl prodrug valganciclovir. Intravitreal ganciclovir implants are also available, with minimal systemic absorption. Ganciclovir is excreted renally.
